movie.title: Notorious
movie.description_intro: NOTORIOUS is the story of Christopher Wallace. Through raw talent and sheer determination, Wallace transforms himself from Brooklyn street hustler (once selling crack to pregnant women) to one of the greatest rappers of all time; THE NOTORIOUS B.I.G. Follow his meteoric rise to fame and his refusal to succumb to expectations - redefining our notion of "The American Dream."
movie.description_full: NOTORIOUS is the story of Christopher Wallace. Through raw talent and sheer determination, Wallace transforms himself from Brooklyn street hustler (once selling crack to pregnant women) to one of the greatest rappers of all time; THE NOTORIOUS B.I.G. Follow his meteoric rise to fame and his refusal to succumb to expectations - redefining our notion of "The American Dream."

movies.title: Belong to Us
movies.summary: An injured dog finds its way into the hearts of a family after escaping an underground dog-fighting ring.
movies.description_full: An injured dog finds its way into the hearts of a family after escaping an underground dog-fighting ring.
movies.synopsis: An injured dog finds its way into the hearts of a family after escaping an underground dog-fighting ring.

movies.title: All the Boys Love Mandy Lane
movies.title_english: All the Boys Love Mandy Lane
movies.title_long: All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)
movies.summary: A group of high-schoolers invite Mandy Lane, an innocent, desirable girl, to a weekend party on a secluded ranch. While the festivities rage on, the number of revelers begins to drop mysteriously.
movies.description_full: A group of high-schoolers invite Mandy Lane, an innocent, desirable girl, to a weekend party on a secluded ranch. While the festivities rage on, the number of revelers begins to drop mysteriously.
movies.synopsis: A group of high-schoolers invite Mandy Lane, an innocent, desirable girl, to a weekend party on a secluded ranch. While the festivities rage on, the number of revelers begins to drop mysteriously.

movies.title: The Sunlit Night
movies.summary: Set between New York City and the far north of Norway, The Sunlit Night follows American painter Frances and émigré Yasha as an unlikely pair who find each other in the Arctic circle. Frances has arrived to jumpstart her career while Yasha has come to bury his father in the land of the Vikings. Together under a sun that never quite sets, they bury the past and discover the future, and family, they didn't know they had.

movies.title: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
movies.title_english: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
movies.title_long: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998)
movies.summary: When a group of scientists are offered funding into genetic research if they agree to try and clone the greatest ever Pokémon, Mew, the end result is success and Mewtwo is born. However Mewtwo is bitter about his purpose in life and kills his masters. In order to become the greatest he throws open a challenge to the world to battle him and his Pokémon. Ash and his friends are one of the few groups of trainers who pass the first test and prepare for battle. However they soon find out about further cloning and Mewtwo's ultimate plan for the earth.
